casebody.data:
WEST SIDE HEAVY HAULING, INC.
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPT. OF CRIME CONTROL & PUBLIC SAFETY, DIV. OF STATE HIGHWAY PATROL, MOTOR CARRIER ENFORCEMENT SECTION. No. COA08-908. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 3, 2009. Certification Date February 23, 2009. Appeal from Wake (07CVS12920).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
